pageProduct.name: Andalou Age Defying Blossom + Leaf Toning Refresher 178g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Fruit stem cell complex, resveratrol CoQ10, and aloe vera polysaccharides instantly hydrate and replenish with essential nutrients, gently soothing irritation and balancing skin's delicate pH as geranium and orange leaf uplift and tone for a natural glow and a rejuvenated complexion.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes.

Common Uses

Facial Toner For Dry, Very Dry Skin Types

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Purified Water (Aqua), Vegetable Glycerin, Panthenol, Sodium PCA, Tocopherol, Sorbitan Oleate Decylglucoside, Fruit Stem Cells (Malus Domestica, Solar Vitis) and BioActive Berry Complex*, Resveratrol, Ubiquinone (CoQ10), Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Allantoin, Aspalathus Linearis (Rooibos) Extract*†, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract*†, Camellia Sinensis (White Tea) Leaf Extract*†, Phenethyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citrus Aurantium (Petitgrain) Flower Oil*, Pelargonium Graveolens (Rose Geranium) Flower Oil* *Certified Organic Ingredients †Fair Trade Ingredients

Directions

AM & PM. Shake well. After cleansing, close eyes and gently mist face and neck.
